channel.description: A blog about ML, DL and anything in between.

item.title: Guide to Syslog-ng
item.description:
• Read time: 15 minutes.

Introduction:

Syslog-ng is an open source log management tool developed by Balabit IT Security LTD.

Syslog-ng is developed from Syslog protocol for Unix and Linux systems. in fact Syslog-ng consists of three components:

  • Application for collecting events
  • Data which is logs collected.
  • Protocol for forwarding events.

There are two editions for Syslog-ng: Open Source Edition (OSE) and Premium Edition. OSE is available for Unix and Linux system. Windows supported in...
